body:
So today I was going to log onto Avicus, then it said "You have been banned for hack evading" -_- ??
So uhh.. Yeah, I guess this is 'goodbye' for now until something happens where you can buy a unban. (which probably wont happen.) So.. Yeah. I guess its goodbye for now :) If there is anyway I can get unbanned, Please notify me.

99250 recorded a guy named (idefk what it is too complicated ._.) for hacking.

Im really lost.
